events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection during morning traffic.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and incident details.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage the claim and assist the customer through the process.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed next steps to the customer.
Request sent to the customer for the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance information.
Customer has uploaded all requested documents including accident photos and official police report.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to determine fault and vehicle repair costs.
The investigation concluded confirming the other driver was at fault for the collision.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and rental car fees was presented to the claimant.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the prompt communication and fair settlement offer.
Claim officially approved and authorization given to proceed with vehicle repair and payment issuance.
Payment covering repairs and additional expenses was successfully issued to the claimantâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim was closed following successful settlement and customer satisfaction confirmation.
